install.windows:
Windows:
1. Download Python from https://www.python.org/downloads/
2. Run the installer and check 'Add Python to PATH'
3. Restart your terminal and run: python --version
install.macos:
macOS:
1. Install Homebrew if not already installed: /bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh)"
2. Install Python: brew install python
3. Verify installation: python3 --version
install.linux:
Linux:
1. Ubuntu/Debian: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install python3 python3-pip
2. Fedora/RHEL: sudo dnf install python3 python3-pip
3. Verify installation: python3 --version
install.default: Please visit https://www.python.org/downloads/ to download and install Python 3.8 or higher for your operating system.
